aboutpara:
I'm currently pursuing a postgraduate degree in AI Engineering, with a special focus on Software Engineering. My journey in technology has been a mix of academic learning and practical experience, where I've had the privilege of working in roles that have shaped my expertise. I've always been passionate about the potential of machine learning and data science to transform industries and improve lives. My work has allowed me to dive into various intriguing domains, including Causal Inference, Computer Vision, AI in Healthcare, Medical Imaging, and Natural Language Processing (NLP). What excites me most is the opportunity to explore AI Safety solutions that can ensure the responsible development of artificial intelligence for the future.

Beyond my personal pursuits, I strongly commit to knowledge sharing and community engagement. I've had the privilege of leading projects, particularly in Computer Vision and NLP, during my tenure as the ML Club President at Universidad Panamericana. Currently, I'm dedicated to teaching Data Science at LeWagon, sharing my insights, and helping others discover the potential of this field.
